ques: The report was clear and _________, with no unnecessary details.
The belief that money can buy happiness is a common _________.
They added a special chemical to _________ the growth of mold.
He asked her to _________ the complex passage in the book.
The tree had a strong and sturdy _________.
Interest will _________ over time in your savings account.
The treasure was hidden _________ the old house.
She was _________ about the authenticity of the story.
Please do not _________ while I am speaking.
She faced a _________ when choosing between two job offers.
The teacher's question _________ed thoughtful responses from the students.
She decided to _________ her cooking with exotic spices.
She felt frustrated when he constantly _________ed her.
She used humor to _________ laughter from the audience.
She delivered a _________ summary of the main points.
She found a surprise gift _________ the wrapping paper.
He remained _________ of the new product's claims.
He pointed out the _________ in her argument.
She decided to invest to _________ wealth for the future.
She injured her _________ in a skiing accident.
The artist sought to _________ her paintings with emotion.
She tried to _________ the poem's meaning in simpler words.
The _________ of whether to stay or leave was difficult.
The speed limit signs are in place to _________ drivers.
The artist's work was intended to _________ strong emotions.
His speech was meant to _________ enthusiasm into the crowd.
The brake system is designed to _________ the vehicle's speed.
The team encountered a moral _________ in their decision.
The phone call _________ed their conversation.
The translator worked to _________ the text into another language.
The idea that all politicians are corrupt is a _________.
The benefits of hard work will _________ over the years.
The river flowed quietly _________ the bridge.
The instructions were presented in a _________ manner.
The scientist was initially _________ of the research findings.
The lizard regrew its _________ after it was lost.
He discovered a secret compartment _________ the floorboards.
The monkey used its _________s to swing from branch to branch.
His _________ was whether to prioritize work or family.
The speaker debunked the _________ with evidence.
They were _________ about the success of the venture.
The company's profits will _________ with successful projects.
He had to _________ his work to attend the meeting.
The summary _________ed the lengthy article for the readers.
The medication is used to _________ the progression of the disease.
The speaker's _________ presentation was well-received.
The aroma of fresh flowers _________ the room with fragrance.
The survey was designed to _________ honest feedback.
The governor took measures to _________ the spread of the virus.
The teacher encouraged students to _________ the Shakespearean sonnet.
The _________ required careful consideration of options.
He climbed the _________s of the tree to reach the fruit.
The coach tried to _________ confidence into the team.
His actions were meant to _________ a reaction from others.
The truth lay _________ the surface of the mystery.
They watched their savings slowly _________ in the bank.
The loud noise from outside _________ed their concentration.
Her _________ attitude led her to question the proposal.
The notion that success guarantees happiness is a _________.
He preferred _________ communication in business emails.
